name: DOKA 2 GUTS OUT NINJA
description: "This is a game where you kill zombies or you yourself are zombie, this is a game where you kill people in the most sophisticated ways" - this words echoes over the streets, covered with piles of rotting corpses.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel Core i3-2330M 2.2GHz with 2 cores or AMD analog Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 (tested) or AMD analog DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 130 MB available space
